Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ACHAT Comfort Stuttgart in Stuttgart (Zuffenhausen), you'll be minutes from Porsche Museum and close to Killesberg Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Weissenhof Museum and Loewentor Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 guestrooms. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include gift shops/newsstands and a television in the lobby. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of ACHAT Comfort Stuttgart. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A train station pick-up service is available for a surcharge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of ACHAT Comfort Stuttgart. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include gift shops/newsstands and a television in the lobby. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 guestrooms. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

With a stay at ACHAT Comfort Stuttgart in Stuttgart (Zuffenhausen), you'll be minutes from Porsche Museum and close to Killesberg Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Weissenhof Museum and Loewentor Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Porsche Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Killesberg Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Weissenhof Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Loewentor Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Bismarck Tower - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Wilhelma Zoo - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Stuttgart State Museum of the Natural Sciences - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Rosenstein Park - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Leuze Mineral Baths - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Linden Museum - 6.4 km / 3.9 mi
St. Catherine's Hospital - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Golfanlage Schloss Nippenburg - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi
University of Stuttgart - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Gottlieb Daimler Memorial - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Carl Zeiss Planetarium - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Stuttgart is Stuttgart (STR) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Hotel Stuttgart is Stuttgart (STR-Stuttgart Airport) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.
